name: getColumn
content:
Retrieves the values stored in a given column of a data table and returns them in a list.

You can only retrieve values from data tables you have already imported into your AppLab project or level.

examples.name: US States
Cereal Nutrition
examples.description: Each "Run" of this code will generate a sentence with a random cereal's name and nutritional information.

palette_params.name: table
palette_params.description: The name of the table containing the column of values to be retrieved.

palette_params.name: column
palette_params.description: The name of the column containing the values to be retrieved.

return_value: A list containing the values from the column in the data table.
short_description: Retrieves the values stored in a given column of a data table and returns them in a list.
tips: If you make multiple lists from different columns contained in the same table, they will all have the same length and values from the a given row will all have the same index in their respective lists.
